H0.text: What was Shakespeare's shortest play - written in 1594. The Comedy of Errors

H1.text: What was Shakespeare's shortest play - written in 1594. Love's Labour's Lost

H2.text: What was Shakespeare's shortest play - written in 1594. The Two Gentlemen of Verona

H3.text: What was Shakespeare's shortest play - written in 1594. Aegeon

A4.text: The Comedy of Errors is one of William Shakespeare's earliest plays. It is his shortest and one of his most farcical comedies

A5.text: Charles Whitworth argues that The Comedy of Errors was written 'in the latter part of 1594' on the basis of historical records and textual similarities with other plays Shakespeare wrote around this time
